song_name: You Give Love A Bad Name
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, You Give Love A Bad Name has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: You Give Love A Bad Name has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Minor,  and C Dorian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
